text: George Leonard Carey, Baron Carey of Clifton, (born 13 November 1935),The Times , 12 November 2009. is a retired Anglican bishop. He was the Archbishop of Canterbury from 1991 to 2002. He was the Bishop of Bath and Wells before. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Archbishops of Canterbury Category:Writers from London Category:English theologians
title: George Carey
